title: Interpretation of a dream about pregnancy with twins for a married woman who is not pregnant

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about pregnancy with twins for a married woman who is not pregnant. There are many dreams that a person sees during his sleep, including a dream about pregnancy, which refers to many symbols that differ from one person to another based on the social and psychological state of the viewer, but in general, they are worthy of praise and beautiful visions, as scientists have explained. The sheikhs have this vision, as pregnancy is one of the couple’s desires, so what is the interpretation of seeing a dream about pregnancy with twins? For a married woman who is not pregnant. What is the interpretation of a dream about pregnancy for a married woman who is not pregnant? Girls aspire to the feeling of motherhood because it is one of the most beautiful feelings and there are many changes and disturbances that occur in a woman’s body during this period. Here is the interpretation of a dream about pregnancy for a married woman who is not pregnant: A dream about pregnancy for a woman For a married woman, it indicates the goodness of the offspring. It also brings her good news. It can indicate many problems and obstacles that a woman faces in her life and family disintegration. When a married woman sees that she is pregnant but in reality she is not, this indicates that her pregnancy is approaching, which will change the course of her life. What? What does it mean to see a pregnancy with twins? The pregnancy stage is considered one of the most important stages that a woman goes through, and it is filled with many mixed feelings of joy and pain. A very good sign for getting rid of financial hardship. Also, dreaming of being pregnant with twins is a sign of progress, prosperity, and reaching a prominent position at work. It symbolizes the fulfillment of the desires and aspirations that you want after several attempts. Interpretation of a pregnant woman’s dream: Pregnancy concerns a woman, because it contains different feelings and sensations that lead to the arrival of pregnancy in a woman’s dream, and in the context of this talk, here is the interpretation of a pregnant woman’s dream: It is a sign of an easy birth and the arrival of a child. Slim. Indicates the psychological comfort and calm that a woman feels. A symbol of success in her professional life, promotion, and stability in her personal life. Interpretation of a dream about pregnancy with twins for a single woman. God has legislated marriage for the purpose of stabilizing the family and increasing offspring. Parents have some responsibilities, represented in procreation, as it is one of the goals they desire to achieve. Achieving it, and in light of that, here is the interpretation of a dream about being pregnant with twins for a single woman: When a single woman sees that she is pregnant with twins, this symbolizes happy news that brings joy and happiness to herself. It is suggested to you a lot of nourishment and psychological comfort that you feel in addition to the success that you achieve. Connotation On the good news that the girl will hear in the coming days and that she will successfully overcome difficult obstacles and pitfalls. It is a sign of the continuous pursuit of progress and advancement in professional and personal life. Interpretation of a dream about pregnancy with twins for a divorced woman. When a divorced woman sees that she is pregnant with twins, this causes her fear and panic, and this dream carries many interpretations and hints. Here are Interpretation of a pregnant woman’s dream of twins: When a divorced woman sees pregnancy, this is evidence of stability in her life, she will achieve great success at work, and get a promotion. It may be an indication of this woman’s forbidden love with a man and her committing sins and disobedience. It also indicates infertility.

title: Flour in a dream and an accurate interpretation for married, pregnant and single women

preview.html: It is stated in the book of interpretation of dreams by the great researcher Ibn Sirin: Flour or flour in a dream is money for the collection or for children. The interpretation of flour was also mentioned in many famous dream interpretation books, which agreed to interpret it with money or offspring. Wheat or wheat flour is considered a positive sign that the fortuneteller is about to be more secure and stable.Flour or flour in a woman’s dreamAn unmarried girl who sees in her dream that she is buying flour or flour, accepts an order that brings comfort or pleasure, because flour is a blessing and in some places or The positions symbolize their good deeds or their marriage. It is also good for a girl to see flour available in abundance. Bags full of flour represent abundant money, and preparing it symbolizes a good job. Flour and flour in a married woman’s dream. As for a married woman who sees in her dream that she has a heavy load of wheat, flour, or flour, she will accept an order that contains a lot of flour. Goodness, either an extensive diet or pregnancy, and perhaps cross flour in a dream. For stability and family happiness, especially if a woman sees that she is preparing it as dough, baking it, or making it from flour for food, and it is good in dreams for the flour to be clean and free of impurities and grit. It is also praiseworthy to store it in a dream in bags or pots, and it is praiseworthy to see flour on top of mattresses or in rooms, because the dream in this context expresses children or children. A married woman should give alms from the flour that was in her house. Flour or flour in a pregnant woman’s dream. Flour in a pregnant woman’s dream represents goodness and safety in general. If she sees in her dream that she is sifting it, filtering it, or mixing it with water and fermenting it, then this is interpreted as facilitating the issue of labor and childbirth. Perhaps a bag of flour refers to a male child. Interpretation of flour in a dream. Flour in a dream of an unmarried person shows money and abundance after work related to trade, and flour in a married man’s dream symbolizes children or children. Interpretation of sifting flour or flour in a dream. Sifting flour in a dream symbolizes good work. Or a prestigious job, and it has been said in some interpretations that sifting flour has a noble lineage or noble descendants, and righteousness in using a sifter or sifter, because this in an unmarried girl’s dream is a sign of a close marriage, and for others it is good news or happy news.

title: Interpretation of seeing a heart operation in a dream in detail

preview.html: Seeing a heart operation in a dream symbolizes guidance and repentance, and whoever sees that he has had a heart operation and succeeded in the dream, this is evidence of his release from all distress and delusion. Interpretation of a dream about heart surgery. Interpretation of seeing a heart operation in a dream. Seeing a heart operation in a dream indicates justice and guidance. In fact, it may indicate escaping from adversity. Whoever sees himself entering the operating room to undergo heart surgery in a dream seeks to resolve crises and escape adversity, and fear when entering for heart surgery in a dream indicates remorse for committing sins and transgressions. It is said that heart surgery in a dream symbolizes the end of sorrows. And the death of worries. Open-heart surgery in a dream indicates forgiveness and the forgiveness of others. Whoever sees that he is performing open-heart surgery in a dream, rebukes those who have a dispute with him to settle it, and the duration of open-heart surgery in a dream indicates the duration of the period of honesty. And preaching. The stopping of the heart during a heart operation in a dream indicates hypocrisy in religion and perhaps desperation to find solutions to crises, anguish and distress. Whoever sees that he is performing a heart operation on someone in a dream, he is fighting for justice and guidance for others. And if you see that you are tearing out a human heart and putting it back together in a dream, then you are giving it Knowledge and knowledge. An EKG before surgery in a dream indicates developing studies and solutions to a difficult issue, and a dream about preparing for a heart operation indicates staying away from sins and starting to change. Seeing cardiopulmonary resuscitation in a dream means hearing words of sympathy, and everyone who sees himself complaining of pain after surgery The heart in a dream indicates that some obstacles and difficulties remain, and God knows best. A cardiologist is a symbol in a dream. A cardiologist in a dream indicates a person who has wisdom and knowledge. Whoever sees that he is calling for a cardiologist in a dream, then he hears news that pleases him, and going to the cardiologist’s office in a dream shows a visitor to places that He feels comfortable and calm in it. Consulting a cardiologist in a dream means asking for advice and perhaps searching for a legal fatwa. Taking medicine from a cardiologist in a dream means finding solutions and getting rid of stress, and a cardiologist’s prescription in a dream symbolizes science and knowledge. The dream of being examined and examined by a doctor A heart indicates that he will get help from a knowledgeable person, and whoever sees the results of medical examinations are good in a dream, he will emerge from his crisis after suffering. Whoever sees that he has become a cardiologist in a dream asks for reconciliation between people and the provision of benefits. Seeing a cardiologist at home in a dream indicates To resolve differences and restore rapprochement between the members of this house. Interpretation of a doctor’s visit in a dream. Interpretation of a successful heart operation in a dream. Dreaming of a successful heart operation indicates getting rid of anything that causes grief and sorrow. Perhaps it indicates repairing relationships with others and the success of open-heart surgery in the dream indicates Blessed new beginnings and the end of hate and hate. Rejoicing at the success of heart surgery in a dream indicates the end of distress and pain, and whoever is happy with the success of another person’s heart surgery in a dream shows his love for goodness and justice. Surviving a heart attack in a dream means surviving the

title: What does it mean to see an exam in a dream for a single, married and pregnant woman?

preview.html: I like itFansSubscribedFans What does it mean to see an exam in a dream for a single, married and pregnant woman? Interpretation of seeing exams in a dream with many interpretations. This dream has not only good connotations but also bad connotations. It can also relate to reality. It may happen that a person sees an exam in his dream as a result of some psychological pressures that he is exposed to in his real life. Below is an explanation of the interpretation of Ibn Sirin’s dream about an exam. We explain the most important cases of seeing an exam in a dream according to the viewer, whether he is single, married, pregnant, male or female, with the following details: Examination of Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of the vision. An exam refers to a test conducted by Almighty God for a person, which It shows how close he is to God. If a person sees in his dream that he is taking an exam and passes it, then this is a good indication that he will overcome some difficulties that he has been patient with, but if he is unable to solve and answer them, then this indicates that failure will happen or something bad. Interpretation of the exam for a manIf he sees in a dream that he is undergoing For an exam, his dream shows the hardships or difficulties that he will face in his life, but he will be patient and overcome them, God Almighty willing, but if he finds the exam difficult, it indicates his irregularity in his prayers and he must approach God. But if he sees himself cheating in exams, then it is not Being honest with himself, or an indication of the presence of sinners that will lead him off the straight path. Vision interpretation examination for individuals. This vision is good for an unmarried girl, as it indicates that she will enter a new stage, engagement or marriage, in the near future. Vision interpretation examination for a married woman If she sees a married woman in her dream She is undergoing an examination, this may be a sign of nutrition to have children or comfort and success in life. Examination Interpretation of a pregnant woman’s vision If a pregnant woman sees in her dream that she is undergoing an examination, this indicates the presence of difficulties and problems, but she will overcome them and her condition will improve, thank God. Explanation of a late examination The owner may see Dreaming in a dream that he is late for the exam or cannot find a room and place for the exam, and this means that there are things in his life that he did not prepare well for and he needs to think and prepare well for them, or it indicates a lack of progress in his work or a failure to catch a good opportunity related to fateful matters or related to his future. And God knows best. Explanation of not preparing for the exam: If Al-Basira is an unmarried girl, this indicates her dissatisfaction with her behavior and her psychological awareness of neglecting it, abandoning her duties, or performing them in an undesirable way. A woman who bears responsibility for her husband or children, but if she is pregnant, this indicates her departure. Through a new experience, which is the pregnancy period, and her need for psychological preparation for it, and God knows best.

title: Interpretation of a dream about front teeth falling out

preview.html: It is worth noting that the process of teeth falling out in a dream can cause panic and fear to its owner, and research continues to find out the interpretation of this, but the interpretation of seeing teeth falling out of hatred varies depending on the nature. . From the dreamer and the nature of the vision. Through what has been narrated, we will learn about all the interpretations of this. Front teeth falling out. The front teeth at the top indicate the father, brother, sons, and uncle, and the lower teeth in the dream indicate the mother, sister, aunt, and daughters. Dream interpreters say that if a person sees that his teeth The lower ones are falling out. They always indicate relief and salvation from all problems and their overcoming, God willing. If one sees the upper front teeth falling out in a dream, this may be an indication that there is a loved one who may be afflicted with some misfortunes such as death, loss, or illness, and God knows best. And if He saw his upper teeth falling out of his hand or mouth during his sleep. This may be an indication that he will hear bad news, as it indicates the emergence of some problems and disagreements between family or friends, and God knows best. When a person sees in a dream the upper front teeth falling out, this may be a sign. On the death of a loved one or his serious illness, and God knows best. When a person sees in a dream the lower front teeth falling out. This may be evidence that the dreamer will get rid of some of the people who harm him in his life. It also indicates the end of the viewer’s problems. Interpretation of seeing the front teeth falling out without When an unmarried woman sees that her front teeth are falling out in her dream. This could be an indication that she is losing something dear to her, but she will not regret it, and this could be an engagement or friendship. If a woman sees in her sleep her front teeth falling out. This could be Evidence that she wants someone to compensate her for the loss of a family member. If a married woman sees in a dream that her front teeth are falling out without pain, it could be a sign that work has stopped. It also indicates the emergence of some disputes between her and the husband, but they will be resolved soon, God willing. We chose for you: Interpretation of a dream about losing teeth by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about teeth falling out in a dream for a single woman. When a woman sees her teeth falling out in her sleep. This is a sign of despair and confusion in the surrounding issues. It also indicates the presence of psychological trauma resulting from betrayal or deception. In the event that an unmarried woman dreams. A married woman has her front teeth falling out. It may be a sign that she is losing a friendship or a relationship with a loved one. If a woman sees in her dream her teeth falling out. It may be an expression of her need for a partner to share the good times with her. When an unmarried woman sees in her dream her teeth falling out. It may be an expression of her need for a partner to share the good times with her. This is an indication of her strong attachment to the person, but he wants to leave her, and God knows best. In the case of a single person seeing his teeth falling out during his sleep. It may be an indication of the lack of feeling of love over the years, and God knows best. When an unmarried woman sees in her dream that her teeth are falling out of her hands. This is an indication that she will marry a tall man who will work to achieve everything she wants. If she dreams

title: What is the complete interpretation of seeing a leper in a dream?

preview.html: Hadout website provides you with a complete interpretation of seeing leprosy patients in a dream. It is a well-known or widespread leprosy disease, and in some places it is called a lizard or a gecko. It is a reptile that lives in desert areas with sand. Seeing this in a complete dream may be one of the visions that came in some people's dreams, because we have collected for you, my dears in God, all the testimonies related to the difference between the interpretation of the great leprosy. In a dream, complete and what the little leper dreams of. Be sure to follow the article. What is the interpretation of Ibn Sirin who sees leprosy? In the complete interpretation of the leper in a dream, the scholar Ibn Sirin said that this is one of the hateful visions associated with jinn, demons and sorcery. The interpretation of large leprosy in a dream indicates the presence of unpleasant things in the dreamer's next life and may indicate that the person has gone through a bad event associated with it. Seeing leprosy in a dream is full of visions that show the dreamer that he will suffer from diseases that will become difficult events for him in his life and indicate that the disease will not be treated. The interpretation of seeing a little leper and running in a dream in full is evidence for the dreamer of the troubles and sorrows that await him in the afterlife. The appearance of a leper on the wall in the dreamer's dream is a sign that he is going through a difficult period and the appearance of undesirable things in the dreamer's dream. See also: A detailed interpretation of seeing a snake and a snake in a complete dream Why do you dream of leprosy for an ordinary woman Leprosy in the dream of an ordinary woman is a sign of unloved things that will happen to the girl in the next life and a sign of sadness and despair. Also, leprosy in a dream, complete for an unmarried girl, is one of Visions that indicate the presence of a handicap in her life that wants her oil and will cause her many problems. Seeing salvation from leprosy for a single girl in a dream is complete evidence of people’s mistreatment and this vision shows her that she will change the way she treats people. Killing a leper in a complete dream is one of the visions of praise that indicates the comfort, support and goodness that the girl will receive in her upcoming life. See also: Why do you dream of seeing cockroaches in a complete dream Why does a leper dream of a married woman? Seeing a married woman with leprosy in a dream indicates her future life full of many problems and sorrows, and shows the marital problems that await her. Leprosy in a married woman’s dream may indicate the destruction of the house and her divorce from her husband, indicating the instability of her future life. Leprosy in a dream for a married woman may indicate a serious illness that she will fall into and is a sign of fatigue and weakness. title: Interpretation of a dream about car racing in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a car race in a dream. We may want to know the interpretation of a dream about a car race in a dream, one of the dreams that makes the dreamer feel very anxious, but he wants to know an explanation for that. Therefore, we will learn about its interpretation in the following lines, which are the interpretations of some working scholars and site managers. They do not have any involvement in the interpretations, but they convey the scholars’ interpretations. Interpretation of a dream about racing cars in a dream: A racing car in a dream can indicate the arrival of a visionary to achieve his goals and ambitions. Anyone who sees it Himself in a car race can mean that he overcomes enemies and overcomes them with the grace of God. If one sees himself participating in a car race, this may indicate success in business and getting a lot of money. Seeing a car race in a dream can mean that you are making strides Steady and fast towards achieving goals and aspirations, thanks to God. Interpretation of a dream about a Qur’an competition in a dream: Whoever sees in his dream that he participated in a Qur’an competition, can indicate excellence in life and success. Dreaming about a Qur’an competition in a dream can indicate positive changes that occur in the life of the dreamer. During this period. If a person sees that he participated in a Qur’an competition and won, this may indicate the confidence that the dreamer feels during this period. When a person sees a Qur’an competition in a dream, perhaps this indicates blessings and happiness in life during this time, and God knows best. Interpretation Dreaming of a beauty pageant in a dream: Whoever dreams of entering beauty pageants may indicate meeting a long-lost person, thanks to God. A beauty pageant in a dream can indicate the grace and kindness that the dreamer will gain during this time. Seeing a woman participating in beauty pageants can indicate The financial gains that she achieves during this time. A woman’s vision may indicate that she went to a beauty pageant for the sake of positive changes that occur in her life during this period, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about competition in a dream: Anyone who dreams that he will participate in an ongoing competition may indicate His search for a diet is extensive. Dreaming of a running competition in a dream may refer to the halal money that the dreamer gets during this period. Seeing a running race in a dream may indicate positive changes in the dreamer’s life during that period. Anyone who dreams that he went to a competition can It is underway that indicates new changes in the dreamer’s life at that time, thanks to God. Interpretation of a dream about a cooking competition in a dream: The vision of going to a cooking competition to obtain some material gains that the dreamer achieves in those days. If one sees that he went to a cooking competition, this may indicate To good changes that may occur in the dreamer’s life in the coming period. Seeing a cooking competition in a dream may indicate a job that the dreamer will obtain or a promotion at work, thanks to God. Seeing a cooking competition in a dream may indicate the success that the dreamer will achieve during this period, and God knows best. Interpretation of the dream of joining a club in a dream may indicate any person

title: Interpretation of the meaning of the name Amina in a dream

preview.html: Amina, an Arabic female name, is derived from the word “Amna” which means safety and harmony. It means reliable, safe, and true to promise and oath. It also means: guardian and guardian. A reliable woman: someone who can be trusted. An honorable woman: that is, a woman who is honest, sincere, and truthful, a woman who is honest, sincere, sincere, compassionate, loving, trusting, and from whom nothing but good comes. In terms of dream interpretation, the name Amina in a dream has more than one positive meaning. In interpretation, it is mercy, affection, peace and compassion. So anyone who sees or hears this name in a dream will become good in everything. The best thing to see this name is to see a woman or girl with the nickname and be called by it. Whoever sees this will rejoice in the goodness, or be rewarded, or receive a good reward or a good blessing, and this we will discover successively in the following paragraphs. Hearing the name Amina in a dreamOne of the best things that a sleeper can see or hear are the names or words that come from safety and security. It is also nice to see the name engraved or written. Whoever hears this name will - God willing - and is destined to attain goodness in his days, so that he may come and obtain what he loves and is pleased with. The name Amina is simple and promising. Read also: Good news and good news in a dream. The name Amina in one dream is considered one of the characteristics of all people. In the dream of an unmarried woman, meaning Yemen, it is comfort and blessing for the one who sees this name or hears it in her dream. If a single woman sees in a dream a woman or girl she knows whose name is Amina, the closest interpretation is that she will wish for something very good. Especially in terms of livelihood, profit and success. It is praiseworthy in a dream to shake hands with an unmarried woman and kiss her. The sign of a kiss here is acceptance in an effort that single women want to realize the good in. Perhaps the dream indicates marriage, especially if the unmarried woman sees in her dream, as if Amina is blessing her or telling her something related to the subject of marriage. Since one of the meanings of the name is honesty in expression, therefore we say to every girl: “Blessed are you when you see your dream. “Your dream is good and brings you a lot of good news.” The name Amina is one of the last and best names. Likewise, these names are: Amina, Yamina, and any name that comes from Amina is - God willing - good for all unmarried women. Read also: Numbers in a dream. Amina’s name in a married woman’s dream. For a married woman, hearing or seeing the name Amina in a dream also portends good news or a very happy event. And maybe get insurance for things he's afraid will happen. If a married woman sees Amina sitting in her home, prosperity and security will prevail. And if you wear a pink robe, then this is happiness. If you give her a ring, she will give birth to a boy. If you go to her kitchen and prepare breakfast or dinner for her, this indicates food. A married woman can see as if her husband has married a woman she knows named Amina. Here, we can only assure every woman who sees this name that it is clear and undeniable good news, especially if Amina is a friend of the fortuneteller, his neighbor, or a character from the past who has faded from memory and suddenly appeared in a dream. Congratulations to every mother.

title: The most important interpretations of seeing a person falling to the ground in a dream, according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing someone falling to the ground in a dream. Falling to the ground is one of the most embarrassing situations a person is exposed to and falling from a height. The person feels embarrassed because of the harm and harm that may be caused to him, and when the dreamer sees someone falling to the ground in a dream, he feels panic and anxiety, especially if he From a high place and looking for clues about this dream. In the science of dream interpretation, it has many interpretations that differ from one case to another depending on the dreamer’s condition, and in the following article we will present in detail all the cases and their interpretations: Seeing someone falling to the ground in a dream Seeing someone falling to the ground in a dream means that he will find a good job opportunity that will improve his situation. Social. A person falling to the ground in a dream is a sign that he is approaching his marriage to a girl with good morals and qualities. Seeing a person lying on the ground in a dirty and scattered place is bad news. A dream of a person falling to the ground and he was clean symbolizes the emergence of many positive changes. In the dreamer's life that will make his life better. If the dreamer sees that he is pushing someone from above to fall to the ground, this indicates that the dreamer wants to deceive him and wants to harm him. Seeing a person falling to the ground in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin interprets seeing a person falling to the ground from a high place It is an indication that there is something that has not been completed in the life of the visionary and has remained incomplete. Slipping on the ground in a dream symbolizes that the dreamer is one of the struggling people who is trying to achieve their goals and achieve their ambitions. Seeing someone falling to the ground in a dream for a single woman. Seeing an unmarried girl falling on The earth in her dream means that she will soon marry a good man who will stand by her and support her in all aspects of her life. A person falling to the ground from a high place in the dreamer’s dream is a sign that she hears a lot of good news and it brings joy and happiness into her life. Seeing the dreamer collapsing to the ground In a dream, it symbolizes her desire to escape from things that were haunting her in the past. Someone slipping on the ground in an individual’s dream is a sign of her success in making the right decisions in her life that determine her destiny. If a girl falls to the ground and then is able to get up again, this It indicates that she overcame the difficulties she was going through. The visionary fell to the ground and was covered in dirt, which indicates that there are many scammers around her who are planning to harm her, so she must be careful. If the dreamer slips on the ground and is injured as a result, this symbolizes The presence of many obstacles blocking her path and her reluctance to make some of her decisions on her own. Seeing someone falling to the ground in a dream for a married woman. Seeing someone falling to the ground in a married woman’s dream is a sign that she is going through some bad things that negatively affect her psychological state. Falling to the ground in The dream indicates that the dreamer is hasty in some of the decisions she makes in her life and that she is not thinking clearly. It also indicates that she will enter a period of worries and sorrows in her life. Deterioration on the ground in a dream may indicate bitterness.

title: What is the interpretation of seeing a sick father in a dream?

preview.html: What is the interpretation of seeing a father in a dream while he is sick? If the father is the other half of his age after the mother, then the father’s approval is the pleasure of the Lord, and it is obligatory for every person. A son and a daughter work with the approval of his mother and father. Father and pain. The father is the one who toils and sweats for his family. He is the one who faces the difficulties of life without fatigue and boredom, but with love. And for convenience, in this article, we will remember today what is the interpretation of seeing a sick father in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a sick father in a dream. Dream interpretation scholars say that seeing a father being sick in a dream indicates a very bad psychological state, and that he has problems and fears. Such a vision may indicate The deterioration of the pioneer’s financial conditions. Interpretation of seeing a father in a dream: If the sleeper sees his father complaining of illness in his dream, this is an unpleasant vision that indicates the arrival of difficult problems in the dreamer’s life, and this vision may indicate the dreamer’s feeling of loneliness. Seeing a sick father in a single woman’s dreamIf a girl sees An unmarried woman sees her sick father in her dream, and she continues to cry for her father. This is a good vision that portends the coming of goodness in her life. Crying in a dream symbolizes freedom from worries. Relief is coming. If an unmarried girl sees her sick father in her dream and hugs him, this is a sign that the dreamer needs someone to hold her and make her feel safe. Seeing a sick father in a dream complaining about his illness and the dreamer calling for him is one of the good visions that warn the dreamer that God He will take away their worries and remove all misfortunes from them, and if the father is sick in reality, this is good news for her that she will recover soon. If an unmarried girl dreams while she is sleeping that her father is sick and is crying from the pain of illness and wiping his tears with her hand, this is a vision that shows that the dreamer is always seeking to Lend a helping hand to her family. Interpretation of seeing a sick father in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees her sick father in her dream and complains about illness, this is a sign of the problems and fears that the dreamer faces and the instability of her life. Seeing a sick father crying in a dream means that the dreamer’s father is in distress and wants someone to stand by him. Interpretation of seeing a father in a dream for a pregnant woman. Seeing a sick father crying in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates that her due date is approaching. Interpretation of seeing a deceased father sick in a dream. If the dreamer’s father has died and the dreamer sees in a dream that his father is sick, then this vision indicates that the father needs someone. He prays over him and gives alms on his behalf, and the dreamer must give him alms. The father. If the sleeper sees in his dream that his deceased father is sick with cancer, this is a vision that indicates that this father does not enjoy his life in the afterlife, and the dreamer should pray for him. This vision may indicate that this father died without paying him, and the dreamer must Paying off the debt left by his father. In conclusion, be supportive of your fathers in reaping the fruits of what you do because every foot will be watered by what is watered and each of us will reap a harvest as a result of our actions and leave dreams at the end of waking time. .
